physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a thin orange border. They are decorated with stylized embroidery of foliage, animals, figures, and deities.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) flower (motif) beadwork (visual works)
